update.description:
The inertial values in the X3 UAVs seem to cause instability when flying the X3. 

**Old**

![old_inertia_opt.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2729534006-old_inertia_opt.gif)

**New**

![new_inertia_opt.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3000983001-new_inertia_opt.gif)

The new values will be updated in fuel once this PR is merged.

I also found that the inertia values in iris.yaml (X3) and neo11.yaml (X4) files in the `rotors_gazebo` package do not correspond to the inertias in the corresponding SDF models. So I've made local copies of the yaml files and updated them to match the SDF models. I didn't a significant difference with the performance of X4 though.

# Testing

First update the inertia of your local X3 Config 1 in ` ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/X3 UAV Config 1/3` with this patch
```
diff -u old/model.sdf new/model.sdf
--- old/model.sdf	2019-07-11 17:07:27.227882579 -0500
+++ new/model.sdf	2019-07-11 17:34:43.739838647 -0500
@@ -7,12 +7,12 @@
                 <pose frame="">0 0 0 0 -0 0</pose>
                 <mass>1.5</mass>
                 <inertia>
-                    <ixx>0.0347563</ixx>
+                    <ixx>0.025</ixx>
                     <ixy>0</ixy>
                     <ixz>0</ixz>
-                    <iyy>0.07</iyy>
+                    <iyy>0.009</iyy>
                     <iyz>0</iyz>
-                    <izz>0.0977</izz>
+                    <izz>0.033</izz>
                 </inertia>
             </inertial>
             <collision name="base_link_inertia_collision">
```
or manually update them so that `xx = 0.0254, yy = 0.0092, zz = 0.0337`.

I've created a branch [uav_inertia_change_test](#!/osrf/subt/branch/uav_inertia_change_test) that uses ground truth measurements and the Lee position controller. Once the branch is installed, run

```
ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X3 robotConfig1:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName2:=X4 robotConfig2:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_1
```

in another terminal,

```
rostopic pub /X3/command/pose geometry_msgs/PoseStamped "header:
  seq: 0
  stamp:
    secs: 10
    nsecs: 0
  frame_id: ''
pose:
  position:
    x: 4.0
    y: 5.0
    z: 5.0
  orientation:
    x: 0.0
    y: 0.0
    z: 0.0
    w: 1.0"
```

and

```
rostopic pub /X4/command/pose geometry_msgs/PoseStamped "header:
  seq: 0
  stamp:
    secs: 10
    nsecs: 0
  frame_id: ''
pose:
  position:
    x: 4.0
    y: 3.0
    z: 5.0
  orientation:
    x: 0.0
    y: 0.0
    z: 0.0
    w: 1.0"
```

To test the old behavior, revert the patch in `X3 Config 1` and change `x3_control/launch/control.launch` to use 
```
      <rosparam command="load" file="$(find rotors_gazebo)/resource/iris.yaml" />
```
instead of
```
      <rosparam command="load" file="$(find x3_control)/resource/iris.yaml" />
```
update.title: Update X3 MOI and make sure iris.yaml and neo11.yaml match the MOI in corresponding SDF models
